Content: After break-in service my G310r doesn't accelerate well on 1st gear, it's mostly just noise, but that is not the case in second gear, second gear acceleration seems decent, during break-in period I felt the first gear accelerated better also on the test ride bike I felt first gear was way better than mine, what may be the issue?

Title: Acceleration issue in first gear
